basics.name: Duong M. Nguyen
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A passionate Vietnamese AI enthusiast driven to tackle real-world challenges through cutting-edge techniques

work.name: University of Illinois Urbana Champaign
work.summary: Research on AI in Healthcare and General Machine Learning. My focus are two-fold: (1) build novel approaches solving real-world problems in medical image processing and (2) build a robust and efficient algorithm to support data privacy, particularly in healthcare domains.

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Hanoi, Vietnam
